meanings.definition: Relating to or involving the action of progesterone.
meanings.sent1: The progestational hormone helps maintain a healthy pregnancy.
meanings.sent2: Doctors may prescribe progestational medications to support fertility.
meanings.sent3: The progestational effects of the medication made the patient feel like a superhero.
meanings.sent4: Her calming presence had a progestational effect on the anxious group, soothing their worries.
meanings.sent5: The progestational properties of the plant were essential for the survival of the species.

meanings.definition: Capable of promoting or supporting pregnancy.
meanings.sent1: A progestational environment in the uterus is crucial for successful implantation.
meanings.sent2: The progestational qualities of certain foods can aid in conception.
meanings.sent3: The progestational dress hugged her belly gently, accentuating her pregnancy glow.
meanings.sent4: His progestational care and attention towards his partner made her feel secure and loved.
meanings.sent5: The progestational atmosphere of the maternity ward was filled with hope and anticipation.
